# PED::BLOCK_PED_FROM_GENERATING_DEAD_BODY_EVENTS_WHEN_DEAD

## Summary
If set to TRUE this ped will no longer generate shocking events when dead

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** block
